meta.author: Mian Muhammad Asif Akhtar
meta.welcome: Welcome to Explorer - A Console line game to find through the spots and go to the exit gate.

spot1.description: You are on the other side of a burnt broken bridge, you look back to see the debris and a steady stream of water. You turn around and see a fountain. (hint : navigate around to explore [ex: `go north`])
spot1.hint: Look around and see if you can find something you can use

spot2.description: You are near the fountain. It is in front of a huge mansion. There is a half filled bottle of water just besides it
spot2.hint: Water is helpful when you are dehydrated from all the walking around

spot3.description: There are trees all around you. There is a sword lying besides you.
spot3.hint: You can use swords to kill enemies

actions.pick sword: You have picked up a sword.

spot4.description: Tall trees are all around you. A speck of light is coming from the south.

spot5.description: There are trees all around you

spot6.description: You have reached the entrance of the huge mansion. The door is locked and all the windows in the front are bolted
spot6.hint: Huge mansions are a treasure of objects :)

spot7.description: You are standing on the banks of a fast flowing river.
spot7.hint: Ahh!! If only I knew where to go

spot8.description: You are at the exit gates!! You finally made it!! Thanks for playing Super Maze
